scripts.bundle: rollup -c rollup.config.js -f cjs -o dist/js-data-sql.js -m dist/js-data-sql.js.map src/index.js && repo-tools write-version dist/js-data-sql.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run bundle
scripts.mocha-sqlite3: DB_CLIENT=sqlite3 DB_FILE="./test.db" mocha -t 30000 -R dot -r source-map-support/register mocha.start.js
scripts.mocha-mysql: DB_CLIENT=mysql DB_USER=root mocha -t 30000 -R dot -r source-map-support/register mocha.start.js
scripts.mocha-all: npm run mocha-mysql && npm run mocha-pg
scripts.cover: DB_CLIENT=mysql DB_USER=root istanbul cover --hook-run-in-context node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -t 30000 -R dot -r source-map-support/register mocha.start.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run cover
scripts.release: npm test && npm run doc && repo-tools updates && repo-tools changelog && repo-tools authors
scripts.ci: npm run test && cat coverage/lcov.info | codecov
